name: Blunderbuss (Sebastian Beltran, hklabs, MKR_E)
description:
Classic Game Boy platforming  adventure on the high seas! 

Ahoy! Captain Sharkface merrily sails his fleet across the ocean with his trusty blunderbuss when suddenly...Mutiny! The treasonous Bosun Orca takes command of his ships and his crew! Now you must shoot and climb your way accross your vessels to take them back.

Defeat all the enemies in every ship, climb of to the top of the mast to restore your flag and fire youself from the dront cannon to the next ship. Orca awaits at the end of your journey, so be ready for the fight of your life!

Controls 

Blunderbuss uses the Game Boy controller setup: four directions and two face buttons.

Use A and D or the Left and Right arrow keys to walk. You can climb ladders with W and S or the Up and Down arrow keys.

Use M to shoot your Blunderbuss. Holding for M for a moment will charge a spreadshot!

Use N to Jump.
